\pagenumbering{gobble}


```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
require(tidyverse)
require(knitr)
require(kableExtra)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
dirw = '~/projects/maize.grn/data' 
ft = file.path(dirw, "10.dataset.tsv")
tt = read_tsv(ft)
kable(tt, format = 'latex', longtable = T, booktabs = T,
  format.args = list(big.mark = ","), 
  caption = "Table X. GRNs built in this study.") %>%
  column_spec(1, bold=F) %>%
  kable_styling("striped", full_width = F)
```


\pagebreak
![Fig 1]($grn/data/14_eval_sum/10.dev.atlas.pdf){width=100%}

Area under receiver operating curves (AUROC) and area under precision-recall curve (AUPR) for GRNs built using different input datasets evaluated using experimentally (Chip-seq, mutant & wildtype RNA-Seq) determined transcription factor (TF) targets.

\pagebreak
![Fig 2]($grn/data/14_eval_sum/05.auc.pdf){width=100%}

Barplot showing AUROC and AUPRs for lin2017 tissue-specific and pooled GRNs. 

\pagebreak
![Fig 3]($grn/data/14_eval_sum/14.go.pdf){width=100%}

Fold enrichment of GO and CornCyc categories for built networks (different sizes of top edges taken).

\pagebreak
![Fig 4a]($grn/data/14_eval_sum/12.briggs.10000.pdf){width=100%}

Enrichment of DE genes (using Briggs dataset) in predicted TF targets made by different GRNs. Only the top 10,000 strongest edges were taken from each GRN.

\pagebreak
![Fig 4b]($grn/data/14_eval_sum/12.briggs.100000.pdf){width=100%}

Enrichment of DE genes (using Briggs dataset) in predicted TF targets made by different GRNs. Only the top 100,000 strongest edges were taken from each GRN.

\pagebreak
![Fig X]($grn/data/14_eval_sum/15.biomap.1.pcc.pdf){width=100%}

Evaluation of GRN predictions using the bioMAP data containing ~200 genotypes (34 inbreds + 200 hybrids) in five tissues.  The (Pearson) correlations between regulators and targets (as predicted by each GRN) were evaluated using the bioMAP expression matrix in each tissue, and shown as a boxplot for the top 10,000, 100,000 or 1,000,000 strongest edges in each network.
